#summary History of bambam releases

= Version 0.5 =

Merged Spike's changes back to this original hosting site, included:

   # improvements by Bram Meleman:
      * fixed screen resolution
      * more colours
      * added mouse drawing
      * added mute/unmute cheat codes
   # improvements by Marcin Owsiany:
      * ability to blacklist some sounds
      * ability to use capital letters

This version is available [https://code.google.com/p/bambam/source/browse/#svn%2Ftags%2F0.5 from the SVN repository], as downloads are no longer available on code.google.com. I've also temporarily uploaded it to:
   * http://owsiany.pl/tmp/bambam-0.5.tar.gz
   * http://owsiany.pl/tmp/bambam-0.5.zip

= Versions 0.3 - 0.4 =

Released with various improvements by Spike Burch, hosted on http://launchpad.net/bambam

= Version 0.2 =

The last version by Don Brown made available for download as a zip file from http://code.google.com/p/bambam
